description: Google Photos is a cloud-based photo storage and organization service offering automatic backups, AI-assisted search, and shared albums for personal and collaborative media management

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_ADD_ENRICHMENT
capabilities.description: Adds an enrichment at a specified position in a defined album.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_BATCH_ADD_MEDIA_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Adds one or more media items to an album in Google Photos.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_BATCH_CREATE_MEDIA_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Unified action to upload media files and create them as items in Google Photos.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_BATCH_GET_MEDIA_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Returns the list of media items for the specified media item identifiers.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_CREATE_ALBUM
capabilities.description: Creates a new album in Google Photos.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_GET_ALBUM
capabilities.description: Returns the album based on the specified albumId.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_GET_MEDIA_ITEM_DOWNLOAD
capabilities.description: Downloads a media item from Google Photos and returns it as a file.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_LIST_ALBUMS
capabilities.description: Lists all albums shown to a user in the Albums tab of Google Photos.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_LIST_MEDIA_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Lists all media items from a user's Google Photos library.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_SEARCH_MEDIA_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Searches for media items in a user's Google Photos library.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_UPDATE_ALBUM
capabilities.description: Updates an album's title or cover photo in Google Photos.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_UPDATE_MEDIA_ITEM
capabilities.description: Updates a media item's description in Google Photos.

capabilities.name: GOOGLEPHOTOS_UPLOAD_MEDIA
capabilities.description: Upload a media file to Google Photos. Supports images (up to 200MB) and videos (up to 20GB).
